tree.name: Royce O'Neale
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Suns sent Bates-Diop, Goodwin, 3 2nds to Nets; Metu, Watanabe, 2026 1st swap to Grizzlies; received O'Neale from Nets, Roddy from Grizzlies
tree.note: Baylor forward, acquired from Brooklyn in 3-team trade at 2024 deadline

assetsGivenUp.name: Keita Bates-Diop
assetsGivenUp.note: Ohio State forward, signed as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: Jordan Goodwin
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Washington in Bradley Beal trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Saint Louis guard, acquired from Washington in Bradley Beal trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Chris Paul
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: PHX traded Ty Jerome, Jalen Lecque, Kelly Oubre Jr., Ricky Rubio and 2022 1st (Peyton Watson) to OKC for Chris Paul and Abdel Nader
assetsGivenUp.note: All-Star point guard acquired from Oklahoma City

assetsGivenUp.name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: PHX traded Trevor Ariza to WAS for Kelly Oubre Jr. and Austin Rivers
assetsGivenUp.note: Wing acquired from Washington in Trevor Ariza trade. Sent to OKC for CP3.

assetsGivenUp.name: Trevor Ariza
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran wing, signed as FA by PHX summer 2018. Sent to WAS for Oubre.

assetsGivenUp.name: Ricky Rubio
assetsGivenUp.note: Spanish guard, signed as free agent by PHX. Sent to OKC for CP3.

assetsGivenUp.name: Ty Jerome
assetsGivenUp.note: Virginia guard, PHX 2019 1st round pick. Sent to OKC for CP3.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jalen Lecque
assetsGivenUp.note: PHX 2019 2nd round pick. Sent to OKC for CP3.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2022 PHX 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: PHX own 2022 1st, sent to OKC for CP3; became #30 overall (traded to DEN)

assetsGivenUp.name: Landry Shamet
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: PHX traded Jevon Carter and #29 pick (Day'Ron Sharpe) to BKN for Landry Shamet
assetsGivenUp.note: Wichita State guard, acquired from Brooklyn Nets

assetsGivenUp.name: Jevon Carter
assetsGivenUp.note: West Virginia guard, PHX 2018 2nd round pick. Sent to BKN for Shamet.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 PHX 1st Round Pick (#29)
assetsGivenUp.note: PHX own 2021 1st, sent to BKN for Shamet; became #29 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: Chimezie Metu
assetsGivenUp.note: USC forward, signed as free agent (sent to Memphis in 3-team trade)

assetsGivenUp.name: Yuta Watanabe
assetsGivenUp.note: George Washington forward, signed as free agent (sent to Memphis in 3-team trade)

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 1st Round Pick Swap
assetsGivenUp.note: Phoenix's right to swap 2026 first-round picks, sent to Memphis

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Least favorable 2026 second-round pick, sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Memphis's own 2028 second-round pick, sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Memphis's own 2029 second-round pick, sent to Brooklyn
